## Maize Outline

Outline for SA maize analysis



### Get Data and Preprocess
```{r data, include=FALSE}
library(pacman)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(stringi)


# Read data and stack
rm(list=ls())
rawdat <- list.files(path="data/", pattern="*csv", full.names = T)
rawdat <- lapply(rawdat, read.csv)
dat <- do.call("rbind", rawdat)
dat$Region <- tolower(dat$Region)
dat$locality <- tolower(dat$locality)
dat$yield <- as.numeric(dat$yield)

write.csv(dat, "allyears.csv")
rm(rawdat)

```


```{r data combining,include=false}
cultivar <- read.csv("data/metadata/cultivarlist.csv")
cultivar$variety_trim <- toupper(cultivar$variety_trim)
cultivar <- cultivar[, !(names(cultivar) %in% c("variety","technology"))]
names(cultivar)[names(cultivar) == "variety_trim"] <- "cultivar_name"
names(cultivar)[names(cultivar) == "X"] <- "technology"
dat$cultivar_name <- toupper(dat$cultivar_name)
dat$cultivar_name <- trimws(dat$cultivar_name, which= c("both"))

dat <- merge(dat,cultivar,by = "cultivar_name")
names(dat)[names(dat) == "Year"] <- "year"
names(dat)[names(dat) == "Provence"] <- "provence"
names(dat)[names(dat) == "Region"] <- "region"
names(dat)[names(dat) == "Rep"] <- "rep"
names(dat)[names(dat) == "Year"] <- "year"
names(dat)[names(dat) == "breeder.x"] <- "breeder"
dat <- dat[, !(names(dat) %in% c("Yellow","White","variety","breeder.y"))]


write.csv(dat, "allyearsmerge.csv")
```

### Average and Summaries 

```{r data summaries}

dat$color <- tolower(dat$color)
names(dat)[names(dat) == "Irrigated"] <- "irrigated"
dat$technology <- gsub("0", "conv", dat$technology)

dat <- dat[c("year", "region", "provence", "locality", "locality_no", "cultivar_name", "alternate", "cultivar_no", "breeder", "rep", "yield", "color", "technology", "crop", "temp", "irrigated", "number", "release_year")]

summarynew <- dat %>% group_by(color, technology, year, .add = FALSE) %>% 
            summarise(mean = mean(yield, na.rm = T), 
            SD = sd(yield, na.rm = T))

p <- ggplot(summarynew, aes(year, mean))
p + geom_smooth(aes(color=technology), size = 1)


write.csv(summarynew, "summary.csv")


```

```{r data merging, include=false}
olddat <- read.csv("data/metadata/allmaize1980_2010.csv")
location <- read.csv("data/metadata/oldlocality.csv")

location$locality <- iconv(location$locality, from = 'UTF-8', to = 'ASCII//TRANSLIT')
location$locality <- str_replace_all(location$locality, "[^[:alnum:]]", "")
olddat$locality <- iconv(olddat$locality, from = 'UTF-8', to = 'ASCII//TRANSLIT')
olddat$locality <- str_replace_all(olddat$locality, "[^[:alnum:]]", "")

location$locality <- tolower(location$locality)
olddat$locality <- tolower(olddat$locality)


olddat <- olddat[!(olddat$yield == "" | is.na(olddat$yield)), ]
olddat <- olddat[olddat$yield >= 0, ]
str_replace_all(string=olddat$cultivar_name, pattern=" ", repl="")

olddat$cultivar_n <- str_sub(olddat$cultivar_name,-1) #create columns with last values
olddat$cultivar_n1 <- str_sub(olddat$cultivar_name,-2,-2)
olddat$cultivar_n2 <- str_sub(olddat$cultivar_name,-3,-3)


olddat$color <- ifelse(olddat$cultivar_n %in% c("W",1,3,5,7,9)
                        |olddat$cultivar_n %in% c("B","R") & olddat$cultivar_n1 %in% c(1,3,5,7,9)
                        |olddat$cultivar_n %in% c("B","R") & olddat$cultivar_n1 %in% c("B","R") & olddat$cultivar_n2 %in% c(1,3,5,7,9),
                        "white", "yellow") #return color based on last values

olddat$last1 <- str_sub(olddat$cultivar_name,-1,-1)
olddat$last2 <-str_sub(olddat$cultivar_name,-2,-1)

olddat$cultivar_br <- str_sub(olddat$cultivar_name,1,3) #make breeder letters
olddat$cultivar_br1 <- extract_numeric(olddat$cultivar_br)
olddat$breeder <- ifelse(olddat$cultivar_br1 %in% c(NA), "ARC", "SA") #add breeder (private vs public?)


olddat$trait <- "A"
olddat$trait <- if_else(olddat$last1 == "R", "R", olddat$trait) 
olddat$trait <- if_else(olddat$last1 == "B", "B", olddat$trait)
olddat$trait <- if_else(olddat$last2 == "BR", "BR", olddat$trait)
olddat$trait <- if_else(olddat$last2 == "BT", "B", olddat$trait)
#need to add a catch for breeder letters

#add season?


olddat <- olddat[c("year", "region", "provence", "locality", "locality_no", "cultivar_name", "alternate", "cultivar_no", "cultivar_br", "rep", "yield", "color", "trait", "crop", "temp", "irrigated", "number", "release_year", "land_type")]


mergedat <- merge(olddat,location,by.x = "locality", by.y = "locality", all.x = TRUE, sort = FALSE)
mergedat$provence.x <- mergedat$provence.y
colnames(mergedat)[4] <- "provence"
mergedat <- mergedat[, !(names(mergedat) %in% c("provence.x","provence.y"))]
mergedat$technology <- mergedat$trait
mergedat$technology <- if_else(mergedat$technology == "A", "conv", mergedat$technology)


olddat <- mergedat[c("year", "region", "provence", "locality", "locality_no", "cultivar_name", "alternate", "cultivar_no", "cultivar_br", "rep", "yield", "color", "technology", "crop", "temp", "irrigated", "number", "release_year", "land_type")]

olddat <- olddat[!(olddat$technology %in% c("R","BR","B") & olddat$year <= 1998),] #remove if before 1998 and GE

olddat <- subset(olddat, olddat$locality!="h"| olddat$locality!="ty")
olddat <- subset(olddat, olddat$provence!=".")


olddat <- olddat[c("year", "region", "provence", "locality", "locality_no", "cultivar_name", "alternate", "cultivar_no", "cultivar_br", "rep", "yield", "color", "technology", "crop", "temp", "irrigated", "number", "release_year", "land_type")]


write.csv(olddat,"olddatacomplete.csv")
write.csv(cultivar,"cultivarbackup.csv") 

mergeall <- bind_rows(olddat,dat)

mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("bethelhem", "bethelehem"), "bethlehem", mergeall$locality) #fix locality names in merged df
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("bloemkomspruit"), "bloekomspruit", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c(" coligny"), "coligny", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c(" wesselsbron"), "wesselsbron", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("foiuriesburg"), "fouriesburg", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("grooptpan"), "grootpan", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("kapsteeel"), "kapsteel", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("losdoorn"), "losdoorns", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("middleburg"), "middelburg", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("losdoorn"), "losdoorns", mergeall$locality)

mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("vilijoenskoon"), "viljoenskroon", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("swartruggen"), "swartruggens", mergeall$locality)
mergeall$locality <- if_else(mergeall$locality %in% c("delmas ", "delmas/rayton"), "delmas", mergeall$locality)

summarycult <- mergeall %>% group_by(year, cultivar_name) %>% summarise(count = n()) # check cultivar if in more than one year/location
summarycult <- summarycult %>% group_by(cultivar_name) %>% summarise (count = n())
mergeall <- merge(mergeall,summarycult, by="cultivar_name")
names(mergeall)[names(mergeall) == 'count'] <- 'cult_nvals'
mergeall <- subset(mergeall, mergeall$cult_nvals!="1")

summaryloc <- mergeall %>% group_by(year, locality) %>% summarise(count = n()) # check location if in more than one year
summaryloc2 <- summaryloc %>% group_by(locality) %>% summarise (count = n()) # trials per location

mergeall <- merge(mergeall,summaryloc2,by= "locality")
names(mergeall)[names(mergeall) == 'count'] <- 'nval'
mergeall <- subset(mergeall, mergeall$nval!="1") # remove if location only used once

rm(summaryloc, summaryloc2, summarylocall, summarylocall2, summarylocall3, summarycult, summarycult2,mergedat)

p <- ggplot(summaryall, aes(year, mean))
```
